response.original_title: Subali-Sugriwa: Battle of the Monkey Kings
response.overview: In conjunction with the 2020 Kennedy Theatre wayang listrik production of the Last King of Bali, this documentary on the 2015-2016 Balinese wayang listrik production of Subali-Sugriwa: Battle of the Monkey Kings, showcases the unique Asian Theatre Program at the University of Hawaiâ€˜i. The film takes a viewer through the 4-month process of rehearsals and training to produce a professional awardwinning theatre production with a primarily student cast and crew and a core team of Balinese guest artists. The majority of the cast had not studied any Balinese performance nor had ever been to Bali.
response.title: Subali-Sugriwa: Battle of the Monkey Kings
